Package com.codeferm.dbaccess.transaction

Transaction functionality.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomikosTransInterceptor
    Intercept methods annotated with Transaction and commit on success or rollback if Exception is thrown.
    AtomikosTransModule
    Binds AtomikosTransInterceptor in the Guice module for methods annotated with Transaction.
    JdbcTransInterceptor
    Intercept methods annotated with Transaction and commit on success or rollback if Exception is thrown.
    JdbcTransModule
    Binds AtomikosTransInterceptor in the Guice module for methods annotated with Transaction.
    QueryRunnerTransInterceptor
    Intercept methods annotated with Transaction and commit on success or rollback if Exception is thrown.
    QueryRunnerTransModule
    Binds AtomikosTransInterceptor in the Guice module for methods annotated with Transaction.
    TransactionFactory
    Simple factory class that returns and Object with methods wrapped in a transaction if the method is annotated with Transaction.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Transaction
    Runtime annotation for method level transaction.

Package com.codeferm.dbaccess.transaction Description
